byline.contributor: Bhadra Sharma reported from Kathmandu and Nida Najar reported from New Delhi
byline.original: By BHADRA SHARMA and NIDA NAJAR

lead_paragraph: The boy had been missing since a neighbor hosted a gathering in which he said that his own son was possessed, and would need a human sacrifice.

headline.main: 11 Arrested in Nepal in Possible Ritual Killing of Boy

snippet: The boy had been missing since a neighbor hosted a gathering in which he said that his own son was possessed, and would need a human sacrifice.
